title: What K-pop ballad songs would you recommend to listen to? - Quora

response.answer_text: Others have already recommended some of the best, but I’d like to recommend the following: Gaho - Stay Here G-DRAGON - (Untitled, 2014) Seventeen - Habit Seventeen - Hug Seventeen - Say yes Seventeen - SIMPLE BTS - Crystal snow NCT U - Without You NCT U - Timeless NCT 127 - No Longer Day6 - You Were Beautiful Day6 - I Loved You Day6 - I Need Somebody THE ROSE - She’s In The Rain THE ROSE - Insomnia THE ROSE - Take Me Down THE ROSE - Sorry VIXX LR - Beautiful Liar (idk if it’s considered a ballad but it’s beautiful nevertheless) TAEYANG - Eyes, Nose, Lips BIGBANG - If You (jungkook’s cover) the original is amazing as well. That’s all i have for now!! ^^ These are personally my style of ballad hope u enjoy. <3
